subject: Lacrosse
Helmets
Sports Injuries
Women and Girls
Concussions
lead_paragraph: Some safety advocates call for head protection in women’s lacrosse, but many others say that the ban on helmets for everyone but goaltenders is the safest approach.
snippet: Some safety advocates call for head protection in women’s lacrosse, but many others say that the ban on helmets for everyone but goaltenders is the safest approach.
